thread.section_title: Spa Store Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa Store Australia | spastore.com.au
thread.title: Steve Berger
thread.title_full: Spa Store Australia reviewed by Steve Berger

author: Steve Berger
title: Steve Berger
text:
Found the product we needed for our spa easily, using Spashop's website search. The site also brought up relevant equipment during the search, eg. Oring for the filter housing lid for which I had searched.
Were able to easily order the parts with a few clicks on my smart phone.
Response to queries via their website were within hours, not days.
Product arrived via courier 3 days after my order was placed.
Very satisfied with spastore.
